overview: Arum's mother, a widow, lives with her children and grandchildren. Cakra's eldest son's move to Bandung and Lulu's desire to buy a house make Arum's mother sad. Family panic occurred after Arum's mother fell. But the incident became a big conflict between Lulu and her mother. Kanaya, her youngest child, tries to match Arum's mother with uncle Gusti, the widower of their neighbor. After all these events, will the family's happiness be maintained? It all depends on the decision of Mrs. Arum.
title: Kapan Pindah Rumah?
